description: **Current Issues:** - Guide sessions, chat sessions saved as individual JSON files - No efficient querying across sessions - File locking not implemented for concurrent access **Optimizations:** - Implement SQLite for session management (lightweight, no separate server) - Index by user_id, session_id, timestamp for fast retrieval - Use Write-Ahead Logging (WAL) mode for better concurrent read/write
